Circular Logic Widget.NAME: Circular Logic Widget
DESCRIPTIONS: When obtained, gained bird faced urn and mummfied hand.  Start each combat with master reality, creative ai, and storm

Clerics Golden Helm.NAME: Cleric's Golden Helm
Clerics Golden Helm.FLAVOR: It's very shiny, that's how you know its important. suggested by Galvior.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a card to your deck, heal #b

Fresh Water.NAME: Fresh Water
Fresh Water.FLAVOR: Always Hydrate Properly. suggested by ezLo2.

PrismaticBranch.NAME: Prismatic Branch
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card to your hand; no restrictions.  Start Each Battle With Corruption and Master of Reality powers.

Sail.NAME: Ship's Sail
Sail.FLAVOR: Catches the wind. suggested by bobjoejuan.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your 4th turn, gain #b

Snecko Skin Boots.NAME: Snecko Skin Boots
Snecko Skin Boots.FLAVOR: Poor confusing creature, now losing its skin. suggested by coledot_.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn +2 str, +2 Dex, -1 str, or -1 Dex, chosen at random

Paper Bomb.NAME: Paper Bomb
Paper Bomb.FLAVOR: It goes boom. Recommended by Galvior.
